channel.title: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !
channel.description: Please someone help me! I want to play and finish Black mesa source but there's something bothers me in game and it is the cause I can't continue playing... my Guns turns to chrome and checkred black-pink like the magnum .357 and the glock pistol ..... and other things like the scientist's clothes, my weapons, the hands and other things that are silver or something steel turns to chrome!! It mix with the environment's color and turns to chrome and the bio hazard's color is also checkred the water also after burning the giant monster on the blast pit ..... there's something wrong. please help and by the way I haven't finish downloading source SDK 2007 and source SDK 2006 could this be the problem its because its not yet finished? its still downloading and not complete while I am playing BMS. I do not receive any errors while playing even its not compete Downloading The Source SDK 2007.

item.title: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !

item.description:
^That’s right, SDK Base 2007 is all

item.title: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !
item.dc:creator: OrdosAlpha
item.description:
You need the Source SDK, Source SDK Base 2006, and Source SDK Base 2007 installed in order to play BM.

item.source: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !

item.title: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !
item.dc:creator: Nightrex
item.description:
Okay… thanks for your suggestion.when Downloading Source SDK 2007, source SDK 2006 is also Downloaded if i let finish source SDK 2007 and pause SDK 2006 will it work still properly or source SDK 2007 and 2006 must be downloaded completely? It only asks for Source SDK 2007 and I want to delete or Pause the source SDK 2006 to save more space and i dont think BMS needs SDK 2006. Do I really need to download SDK 2006 100% ?

Read full topic
item.source: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !

item.title: Texture error, water texture and weapons turned to checkred pink-black !
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
You NEED Source sdk 2007 files. Though it might not be a problem in this case. Finish downloading source sdk files, validate them and then try again. IF that doesn’t help, redownload bm and try again.

Read full topic
